description: 【Chinese Version】Updated on 2024.05.13, a comprehensive display of Kubernetes resources! Includes an overall view of K8S resources, detailed microservices resources, detailed Pod resources, and K8S network bandwidth, optimizing the display of key metrics. https://grafana.com/orgs/starsliao/dashboards
